full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI CHAS 'BUL MCHOD SPRIN DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI CHAS 'BUL MCHOD SPRIN DANG BCAS PA 'DI RANG NYID MOS PAS PHYAG MTSAN SOGS GSAR BSGRUN GYI 'BUL TSIG RTZOM 'DOD YONG BA NYE CHAR RTA NAG SDE PA LUNG SHAR BA'I RIGS RGYUD SLOB BU DBU MDZAD PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I RKYEN GYIS, DAM PA'I MING CAN 'CHANG BAS BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GIS SO, ,)
